description: In Publicis Sapient, I am working as a front end developer with technologies like NextJS, ReactJS, testing-library, Jest, Git, Lerna, Sonarqube, Veracode etc. I am responsible for developing robust and scalable websites and be a part of end to end process starting from requirement gathering till managing devops. In addition to this, I also help and mentor junior resources and guide them when they face difficulties with the project or any technical thing.

In Mindtree, I worked as a front end engineer. I was responsible for managing the frontend of the project. I was part of the SDLC process i.e., requirement gathering, development, unit testing, demo and deployment.
